typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		elevation_feet as string,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFAirport
SFAirport derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as double,
		longitude as double,
		elevation_feet as integer,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AIRPORTtoSQL
